abstract: Stocks slip as energy company shares decline with price of oil.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Xerox slumped after the company reported an 85 percent drop in earnings. Consumer stocks are trading higher.

headline.main: Energy Shares Lead a Retreat as Earnings Disappoint
headline.print_headline: Energy Shares Lead a Market Retreat

snippet: Shares of Xerox slumped after the company reported an 85 percent drop in earnings. Consumer stocks are trading higher.
